ayahs.text: Al^m^S^
kita`bN >unzila <ilayoka falaA yakun fiY Sadorika HarajN m~inohu litun*ira bihi. wa*ikoraY` lilomu&ominiyna
{t~abiEuwA@ maA^ >unzila <ilayokum m~in r~ab~ikumo walaA tat~abiEuwA@ min duwnihi.^ >awoliyaA^'a qaliylFA m~aA ta*ak~aruwna
wakam m~in qaroyapK >aholakona`haA fajaA^'ahaA ba>osunaA baya`tFA >awo humo qaA^}iluwna
famaA kaAna daEowaY`humo <i*o jaA^'ahum ba>osunaA^ <il~aA^ >an qaAluw^A@ <in~aA kun~aA Za`limiyna
falanaso_#alan~a {l~a*iyna >urosila <ilayohimo walanaso_#alan~a {lomurosaliyna
falanaquS~an~a Ealayohim biEilomK wamaA kun~aA gaA^}ibiyna
wa{lowazonu yawoma}i*K {loHaq~u faman vaqulato mawa`ziynuhu, fa>uw@la`^}ika humu {lomufoliHuwna
wamano xaf~ato mawa`ziynuhu, fa>uw@la`^}ika {l~a*iyna xasiruw^A@ >anfusahum bimaA kaAnuwA@ bi_#aAya`tinaA yaZolimuwna
walaqado mak~an~a`kumo fiY {lo>aroDi wajaEalonaA lakumo fiyhaA maEa`yi$a qaliylFA m~aA ta$okuruwna
walaqado xalaqona`kumo vum~a Saw~arona`kumo vum~a qulonaA lilomala`^}ikapi {sojuduwA@ li'aAdama fasajaduw^A@ <il~aA^ <iboliysa lamo yakun m~ina {ls~a`jidiyna
qaAla maA manaEaka >al~aA tasojuda <i*o >amarotuka qaAla >anaA" xayorN m~inohu xalaqotaniY min n~aArK waxalaqotahu, min TiynK
qaAla fa{hobiTo minohaA famaA yakuwnu laka >an tatakab~ara fiyhaA fa{xorujo <in~aka mina {lS~a`giriyna
qaAla >anZironiY^ <ilaY` yawomi yuboEavuwna
qaAla <in~aka mina {lomunZariyna
qaAla fabimaA^ >agowayotaniY la>aqoEudan~a lahumo Sira`Taka {lomusotaqiyma
vum~a la'aAtiyan~ahum m~in[ bayoni >ayodiyhimo wamino xalofihimo waEano >ayoma`nihimo waEan $amaA^}ilihimo walaA tajidu >akovarahumo $a`kiriyna
qaAla {xorujo minohaA ma*o'uwmFA m~adoHuwrFA l~aman tabiEaka minohumo la>amola>an~a jahan~ama minkumo >ajomaEiyna
waya`^_#aAdamu {sokuno >anta wazawojuka {lojan~apa fakulaA mino Hayovu $i}otumaA walaA taqorabaA ha`*ihi {l$~ajarapa fatakuwnaA mina {lZ~a`limiyna

fawasowasa lahumaA {l$~ayoTa`nu liyubodiYa lahumaA maA wu,riYa EanohumaA min sawo'a`tihimaA waqaAla maA nahaY`kumaA rab~ukumaA Eano ha`*ihi {l$~ajarapi <il~aA^ >an takuwnaA malakayoni >awo takuwnaA mina {loxa`lidiyna
waqaAsamahumaA^ <in~iY lakumaA lamina {ln~a`SiHiyna

fadal~aY`humaA biguruwrK falam~aA *aAqaA {l$~ajarapa badato lahumaA sawo'a`tuhumaA waTafiqaA yaxoSifaAni EalayohimaA min waraqi {lojan~api wanaAdaY`humaA rab~uhumaA^ >alamo >anohakumaA Ean tilokumaA {l$~ajarapi wa>aqul l~akumaA^ <in~a {l$~ayoTa`na lakumaA Eaduw~N m~ubiynN
qaAlaA rab~anaA ZalamonaA^ >anfusanaA wa<in l~amo tagofiro lanaA wataroHamonaA lanakuwnan~a mina {loxa`siriyna
qaAla {hobiTuwA@ baEoDukumo libaEoDK Eaduw~N walakumo fiY {lo>aroDi musotaqar~N wamata`EN <ilaY` HiynK
qaAla fiyhaA taHoyawona wafiyhaA tamuwtuwna waminohaA tuxorajuwna
ya`baniY^ 'aAdama qado >anzalonaA Ealayokumo libaAsFA yuwa`riY sawo'a`tikumo wariy$FA walibaAsu {lt~aqowaY` *a`lika xayorN *a`lika mino 'aAya`ti {ll~ahi laEal~ahumo ya*~ak~aruwna

ya`baniY^ 'aAdama laA yafotinan~akumu {l$~ayoTa`nu kamaA^ >axoraja >abawayokum m~ina {lojan~api yanziEu EanohumaA libaAsahumaA liyuriyahumaA sawo'a`tihimaA^ <in~ahu, yaraY`kumo huwa waqabiyluhu, mino Hayovu laA tarawonahumo <in~aA jaEalonaA {l$~aya`Tiyna >awoliyaA^'a lil~a*iyna laA yu&ominuwna
wa<i*aA faEaluwA@ fa`Hi$apF qaAluwA@ wajadonaA EalayohaA^ 'aAbaA^'anaA wa{ll~ahu >amaranaA bihaA qulo <in~a {ll~aha laA ya>omuru bi{lofaHo$aA^'i >ataquwluwna EalaY {ll~ahi maA laA taEolamuwna
qulo >amara rab~iY bi{loqisoTi wa>aqiymuwA@ wujuwhakumo Einda kul~i masojidK wa{doEuwhu muxoliSiyna lahu {ld~iyna kamaA bada>akumo taEuwduwna
fariyqFA hadaY` wafariyqFA Haq~a Ealayohimu {lD~ala`lapu <in~ahumu {t~axa*uwA@ {l$~aya`Tiyna >awoliyaA^'a min duwni {ll~ahi wayaHosabuwna >an~ahum m~uhotaduwna
ya`baniY^ 'aAdama xu*uwA@ ziynatakumo Einda kul~i masojidK wakuluwA@ wa{$orabuwA@ walaA tusorifuw^A@ <in~ahu, laA yuHib~u {lomusorifiyna

qulo mano Har~ama ziynapa {ll~ahi {l~atiY^ >axoraja liEibaAdihi. wa{lT~ay~iba`ti mina {lr~izoqi qulo hiYa lil~a*iyna 'aAmanuwA@ fiY {loHayaw`pi {ld~unoyaA xaAliSapF yawoma {loqiya`mapi ka*a`lika nufaS~ilu {lo'aAya`ti liqawomK yaEolamuwna

qulo <in~amaA Har~ama rab~iYa {lofawa`Hi$a maA Zahara minohaA wamaA baTana wa{lo<ivoma wa{lobagoYa bigayori {loHaq~i wa>an tu$orikuwA@ bi{ll~ahi maA lamo yunaz~ilo bihi. suloTa`nFA wa>an taquwluwA@ EalaY {ll~ahi maA laA taEolamuwna
walikul~i >um~apK >ajalN fa<i*aA jaA^'a >ajaluhumo laA yasota>oxiruwna saAEapF walaA yasotaqodimuwna
ya`baniY^ 'aAdama <im~aA ya>otiyan~akumo rusulN m~inkumo yaquS~uwna Ealayokumo 'aAya`tiY famani {t~aqaY` wa>aSolaHa falaA xawofN Ealayohimo walaA humo yaHozanuwna
wa{l~a*iyna ka*~abuwA@ bi_#aAya`tinaA wa{sotakobaruwA@ EanohaA^ >uw@la`^}ika >aSoHa`bu {ln~aAri humo fiyhaA xa`liduwna

famano >aZolamu mim~ani {fotaraY` EalaY {ll~ahi ka*ibFA >awo ka*~aba bi_#aAya`tihi.^ >uw@la`^}ika yanaAluhumo naSiybuhum m~ina {lokita`bi Hat~aY`^ <i*aA jaA^'atohumo rusulunaA yatawaf~awonahumo qaAluw^A@ >ayona maA kuntumo tadoEuwna min duwni {ll~ahi qaAluwA@ Dal~uwA@ Ean~aA wa$ahiduwA@ EalaY`^ >anfusihimo >an~ahumo kaAnuwA@ ka`firiyna

qaAla {doxuluwA@ fiY^ >umamK qado xalato min qabolikum m~ina {lojin~i wa{lo<insi fiY {ln~aAri kul~amaA daxalato >um~apN l~aEanato >uxotahaA Hat~aY`^ <i*aA {d~aArakuwA@ fiyhaA jamiyEFA qaAlato >uxoraY`humo li>uwlaY`humo rab~anaA ha`^&ulaA^'i >aDal~uwnaA fa_#aAtihimo Ea*aAbFA DiEofFA m~ina {ln~aAri qaAla likul~K DiEofN wala`kin l~aA taEolamuwna
waqaAlato >uwlaY`humo li>uxoraY`humo famaA kaAna lakumo EalayonaA min faDolK fa*uwquwA@ {loEa*aAba bimaA kuntumo takosibuwna

<in~a {l~a*iyna ka*~abuwA@ bi_#aAya`tinaA wa{sotakobaruwA@ EanohaA laA tufat~aHu lahumo >abowa`bu {ls~amaA^'i walaA yadoxuluwna {lojan~apa Hat~aY` yalija {lojamalu fiY sam~i {loxiyaATi waka*a`lika najoziY {lomujorimiyna
lahum m~in jahan~ama mihaAdN wamin fawoqihimo gawaA$K waka*a`lika najoziY {lZ~a`limiyna
wa{l~a*iyna 'aAmanuwA@ waEamiluwA@ {lS~a`liHa`ti laA nukal~ifu nafosFA <il~aA wusoEahaA^ >uw@la`^}ika >aSoHa`bu {lojan~api humo fiyhaA xa`liduwna

wanazaEonaA maA fiY Suduwrihim m~ino gil~K tajoriY min taHotihimu {lo>anoha`ru waqaAluwA@ {loHamodu lil~ahi {l~a*iY hadaY`naA liha`*aA wamaA kun~aA linahotadiYa lawolaA^ >ano hadaY`naA {ll~ahu laqado jaA^'ato rusulu rab~inaA bi{loHaq~i wanuwduw^A@ >an tilokumu {lojan~apu >uwrivotumuwhaA bimaA kuntumo taEomaluwna

wanaAdaY`^ >aSoHa`bu {lojan~api >aSoHa`ba {ln~aAri >an qado wajadonaA maA waEadanaA rab~unaA Haq~FA fahalo wajadt~um m~aA waEada rab~ukumo Haq~FA qaAluwA@ naEamo fa>a*~ana mu&a*~inN[ bayonahumo >an l~aEonapu {ll~ahi EalaY {lZ~a`limiyna
{l~a*iyna yaSud~uwna Ean sabiyli {ll~ahi wayaboguwnahaA EiwajFA wahum bi{lo'aAxirapi ka`firuwna
wabayonahumaA HijaAbN waEalaY {lo>aEoraAfi rijaAlN yaEorifuwna kul~F[A bisiymaY`humo wanaAdawoA@ >aSoHa`ba {lojan~api >an sala`mN Ealayokumo lamo yadoxuluwhaA wahumo yaTomaEuwna
wa<i*aA Surifato >aboSa`ruhumo tiloqaA^'a >aSoHa`bi {ln~aAri qaAluwA@ rab~anaA laA tajoEalonaA maEa {loqawomi {lZ~a`limiyna
wanaAdaY`^ >aSoHa`bu {lo>aEoraAfi rijaAlFA yaEorifuwnahum bisiymaY`humo qaAluwA@ maA^ >agonaY` Eankumo jamoEukumo wamaA kuntumo tasotakobiruwna
>aha`^&ulaA^'i {l~a*iyna >aqosamotumo laA yanaAluhumu {ll~ahu biraHomapK {doxuluwA@ {lojan~apa laA xawofN Ealayokumo walaA^ >antumo taHozanuwna
wanaAdaY`^ >aSoHa`bu {ln~aAri >aSoHa`ba {lojan~api >ano >afiyDuwA@ EalayonaA mina {lomaA^'i >awo mim~aA razaqakumu {ll~ahu qaAluw^A@ <in~a {ll~aha Har~amahumaA EalaY {loka`firiyna
{l~a*iyna {t~axa*uwA@ diynahumo lahowFA walaEibFA wagar~atohumu {loHayaw`pu {ld~unoyaA fa{loyawoma nansaY`humo kamaA nasuwA@ liqaA^'a yawomihimo ha`*aA wamaA kaAnuwA@ bi_#aAya`tinaA yajoHaduwna
walaqado ji}ona`hum bikita`bK faS~alona`hu EalaY` EilomK hudFY waraHomapF l~iqawomK yu&ominuwna

halo yanZuruwna <il~aA ta>owiylahu, yawoma ya>otiY ta>owiyluhu, yaquwlu {l~a*iyna nasuwhu min qabolu qado jaA^'ato rusulu rab~inaA bi{loHaq~i fahal l~anaA min $ufaEaA^'a faya$ofaEuwA@ lanaA^ >awo nurad~u fanaEomala gayora {l~a*iY kun~aA naEomalu qado xasiruw^A@ >anfusahumo waDal~a Eanohum m~aA kaAnuwA@ yafotaruwna

<in~a rab~akumu {ll~ahu {l~a*iY xalaqa {ls~ama`wa`ti wa{lo>aroDa fiY sit~api >ay~aAmK vum~a {sotawaY` EalaY {loEaro$i yugo$iY {l~ayola {ln~ahaAra yaTolubuhu, HaviyvFA wa{l$~amosa wa{loqamara wa{ln~ujuwma musax~ara`tK] bi>amorihi.^ >alaA lahu {loxaloqu wa{lo>amoru tabaAraka {ll~ahu rab~u {loEa`lamiyna
{doEuwA@ rab~akumo taDar~uEFA waxufoyapF <in~ahu, laA yuHib~u {lomuEotadiyna
walaA tufosiduwA@ fiY {lo>aroDi baEoda <iSola`HihaA wa{doEuwhu xawofFA waTamaEFA <in~a raHomata {ll~ahi qariybN m~ina {lomuHosiniyna

wahuwa {l~a*iY yurosilu {lr~iya`Ha bu$orF[A bayona yadaYo raHomatihi. Hat~aY`^ <i*aA^ >aqal~ato saHaAbFA viqaAlFA suqona`hu libaladK m~ay~itK fa>anzalonaA bihi {lomaA^'a fa>axorajonaA bihi. min kul~i {lv~amara`ti ka*a`lika nuxoriju {lomawotaY` laEal~akumo ta*ak~aruwna
wa{lobaladu {lT~ay~ibu yaxoruju nabaAtuhu, bi<i*oni rab~ihi. wa{l~a*iY xabuva laA yaxoruju <il~aA nakidFA ka*a`lika nuSar~ifu {lo'aAya`ti liqawomK ya$okuruwna
laqado >arosalonaA nuwHFA <ilaY` qawomihi. faqaAla ya`qawomi {EobuduwA@ {ll~aha maA lakum m~ino <ila`hK gayoruhu,^ <in~iY^ >axaAfu Ealayokumo Ea*aAba yawomK EaZiymK
qaAla {lomala>u min qawomihi.^ <in~aA lanaraY`ka fiY Dala`lK m~ubiynK
qaAla ya`qawomi layosa biY Dala`lapN wala`kin~iY rasuwlN m~in r~ab~i {loEa`lamiyna
>ubal~igukumo risa`la`ti rab~iY wa>anSaHu lakumo wa>aEolamu mina {ll~ahi maA laA taEolamuwna
>awaEajibotumo >an jaA^'akumo *ikorN m~in r~ab~ikumo EalaY` rajulK m~inkumo liyun*irakumo walitat~aquwA@ walaEal~akumo turoHamuwna
faka*~abuwhu fa>anjayona`hu wa{l~a*iyna maEahu, fiY {lofuloki wa>agoraqonaA {l~a*iyna ka*~abuwA@ bi_#aAya`tinaA^ <in~ahumo kaAnuwA@ qawomFA Eamiyna
wa<ilaY` EaAdK >axaAhumo huwdFA qaAla ya`qawomi {EobuduwA@ {ll~aha maA lakum m~ino <ila`hK gayoruhu,^ >afalaA tat~aquwna
qaAla {lomala>u {l~a*iyna kafaruwA@ min qawomihi.^ <in~aA lanaraY`ka fiY safaAhapK wa<in~aA lanaZun~uka mina {loka`*ibiyna
qaAla ya`qawomi layosa biY safaAhapN wala`kin~iY rasuwlN m~in r~ab~i {loEa`lamiyna
>ubal~igukumo risa`la`ti rab~iY wa>anaA" lakumo naASiHN >amiynN

>awaEajibotumo >an jaA^'akumo *ikorN m~in r~ab~ikumo EalaY` rajulK m~inkumo liyun*irakumo wa{*okuruw^A@ <i*o jaEalakumo xulafaA^'a min[ baEodi qawomi nuwHK wazaAdakumo fiY {loxaloqi baS:oTapF fa{*okuruw^A@ 'aAlaA^'a {ll~ahi laEal~akumo tufoliHuwna
qaAluw^A@ >aji}otanaA linaEobuda {ll~aha waHodahu, wana*ara maA kaAna yaEobudu 'aAbaA^&unaA fa>otinaA bimaA taEidunaA^ <in kunta mina {lS~a`diqiyna

qaAla qado waqaEa Ealayokum m~in r~ab~ikumo rijosN wagaDabN >atuja`diluwnaniY fiY^ >asomaA^'K sam~ayotumuwhaA^ >antumo wa'aAbaA^&ukum m~aA naz~ala {ll~ahu bihaA min suloTa`nK fa{ntaZiruw^A@ <in~iY maEakum m~ina {lomuntaZiriyna
fa>anjayona`hu wa{l~a*iyna maEahu, biraHomapK m~in~aA waqaTaEonaA daAbira {l~a*iyna ka*~abuwA@ bi_#aAya`tinaA wamaA kaAnuwA@ mu&ominiyna

wa<ilaY` vamuwda >axaAhumo Sa`liHFA qaAla ya`qawomi {EobuduwA@ {ll~aha maA lakum m~ino <ila`hK gayoruhu, qado jaA^'atokum bay~inapN m~in r~ab~ikumo ha`*ihi. naAqapu {ll~ahi lakumo 'aAyapF fa*aruwhaA ta>okulo fiY^ >aroDi {ll~ahi walaA tamas~uwhaA bisuw^'K faya>oxu*akumo Ea*aAbN >aliymN

wa{*okuruw^A@ <i*o jaEalakumo xulafaA^'a min[ baEodi EaAdK wabaw~a>akumo fiY {lo>aroDi tat~axi*uwna min suhuwlihaA quSuwrFA watanoHituwna {lojibaAla buyuwtFA fa{*okuruw^A@ 'aAlaA^'a {ll~ahi walaA taEovawoA@ fiY {lo>aroDi mufosidiyna

qaAla {lomala>u {l~a*iyna {sotakobaruwA@ min qawomihi. lil~a*iyna {sotuDoEifuwA@ limano 'aAmana minohumo >ataEolamuwna >an~a Sa`liHFA m~urosalN m~in r~ab~ihi. qaAluw^A@ <in~aA bimaA^ >urosila bihi. mu&ominuwna
qaAla {l~a*iyna {sotakobaruw^A@ <in~aA bi{l~a*iY^ 'aAmantum bihi. ka`firuwna
faEaqaruwA@ {ln~aAqapa waEatawoA@ Eano >amori rab~ihimo waqaAluwA@ ya`Sa`liHu {}otinaA bimaA taEidunaA^ <in kunta mina {lomurosaliyna
fa>axa*atohumu {lr~ajofapu fa>aSobaHuwA@ fiY daArihimo ja`vimiyna
fatawal~aY` Eanohumo waqaAla ya`qawomi laqado >abolagotukumo risaAlapa rab~iY wanaSaHotu lakumo wala`kin l~aA tuHib~uwna {ln~a`SiHiyna
waluwTFA <i*o qaAla liqawomihi.^ >ata>otuwna {lofa`Hi$apa maA sabaqakum bihaA mino >aHadK m~ina {loEa`lamiyna
<in~akumo lata>otuwna {lr~ijaAla $ahowapF m~in duwni {ln~isaA^'i balo >antumo qawomN m~usorifuwna
wamaA kaAna jawaAba qawomihi.^ <il~aA^ >an qaAluw^A@ >axorijuwhum m~in qaroyatikumo <in~ahumo >unaAsN yataTah~aruwna
fa>anjayona`hu wa>aholahu,^ <il~aA {mora>atahu, kaAnato mina {loga`biriyna
wa>amoTaronaA Ealayohim m~aTarFA fa{nZuro kayofa kaAna Ea`qibapu {lomujorimiyna

wa<ilaY` madoyana >axaAhumo $uEayobFA qaAla ya`qawomi {EobuduwA@ {ll~aha maA lakum m~ino <ila`hK gayoruhu, qado jaA^'atokum bay~inapN m~in r~ab~ikumo fa>awofuwA@ {lokayola wa{lomiyzaAna walaA taboxasuwA@ {ln~aAsa >a$oyaA^'ahumo walaA tufosiduwA@ fiY {lo>aroDi baEoda <iSola`HihaA *a`likumo xayorN l~akumo <in kuntum m~u&ominiyna

walaA taqoEuduwA@ bikul~i Sira`TK tuwEiduwna wataSud~uwna Ean sabiyli {ll~ahi mano 'aAmana bihi. wataboguwnahaA EiwajFA wa{*okuruw^A@ <i*o kuntumo qaliylFA fakav~arakumo wa{nZuruwA@ kayofa kaAna Ea`qibapu {lomufosidiyna
wa<in kaAna TaA^}ifapN m~inkumo 'aAmanuwA@ bi{l~a*iY^ >urosilotu bihi. waTaA^}ifapN l~amo yu&ominuwA@ fa{SobiruwA@ Hat~aY` yaHokuma {ll~ahu bayonanaA wahuwa xayoru {loHa`kimiyna
qaAla {lomala>u {l~a*iyna {sotakobaruwA@ min qawomihi. lanuxorijan~aka ya`$uEayobu wa{l~a*iyna 'aAmanuwA@ maEaka min qaroyatinaA^ >awo lataEuwdun~a fiY mil~atinaA qaAla >awalawo kun~aA ka`rihiyna

qadi {fotarayonaA EalaY {ll~ahi ka*ibFA <ino EudonaA fiY mil~atikum baEoda <i*o naj~aY`naA {ll~ahu minohaA wamaA yakuwnu lanaA^ >an n~aEuwda fiyhaA^ <il~aA^ >an ya$aA^'a {ll~ahu rab~unaA wasiEa rab~unaA kul~a $aYo'K EilomFA EalaY {ll~ahi tawak~alonaA rab~anaA {fotaHo bayonanaA wabayona qawominaA bi{loHaq~i wa>anta xayoru {lofa`tiHiyna
waqaAla {lomala>u {l~a*iyna kafaruwA@ min qawomihi. la}ini {t~abaEotumo $uEayobFA <in~akumo <i*FA l~axa`siruwna
fa>axa*atohumu {lr~ajofapu fa>aSobaHuwA@ fiY daArihimo ja`vimiyna
{l~a*iyna ka*~abuwA@ $uEayobFA ka>an l~amo yagonawoA@ fiyhaA {l~a*iyna ka*~abuwA@ $uEayobFA kaAnuwA@ humu {loxa`siriyna
fatawal~aY` Eanohumo waqaAla ya`qawomi laqado >abolagotukumo risa`la`ti rab~iY wanaSaHotu lakumo fakayofa 'aAsaY` EalaY` qawomK ka`firiyna
wamaA^ >arosalonaA fiY qaroyapK m~in n~abiY~K <il~aA^ >axa*onaA^ >aholahaA bi{loba>osaA^'i wa{lD~ar~aA^'i laEal~ahumo yaD~ar~aEuwna
vum~a bad~alonaA makaAna {ls~ay~i}api {loHasanapa Hat~aY` EafawA@ w~aqaAluwA@ qado mas~a 'aAbaA^'anaA {lD~ar~aA^'u wa{ls~ar~aA^'u fa>axa*ona`hum bagotapF wahumo laA ya$oEuruwna
walawo >an~a >ahola {loquraY`^ 'aAmanuwA@ wa{t~aqawoA@ lafataHonaA Ealayohim baraka`tK m~ina {ls~amaA^'i wa{lo>aroDi wala`kin ka*~abuwA@ fa>axa*ona`hum bimaA kaAnuwA@ yakosibuwna
